name: Bis(2,4,4-trimethylpentyl)phosphinic acid-modified titanium dioxide (produced by chemically reacting bis(2,4,4-trimethylpentyl)phosphinic acid (bis) with titanium dioxide to achieve a treatment level of up to 0.6% bis by weight of the pigment).
FoodContactSubstance: Bis(2,4,4-trimethylpentyl)phosphinic acid-modified titanium dioxide (produced by chemically reacting bis(2,4,4-trimethylpentyl)phosphinic acid (bis) with titanium dioxide to achieve a treatment level of up to 0.6% bis by weight of the pigment).
